## Игровые правила ##

#AI_FACTION_LOWER

rule_option_ai_faction_lower_GER = { reversed = yes enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_LOWER } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GER" value = 50 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GER" value = -75 } }

#AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT

rule_option_ai_faction_one_continent_GER = { reversed = yes enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_CONTINENT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER } NOT = { AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = europe } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = north_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = south_america } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = australia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = africa } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = asia } } } AND = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } GER = { capital_scope = { is_on_continent = middle_east } } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes	ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GER" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GER" value = -6000 } }

#AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_HARD

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_hard_GER = { reversed = yes enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_HARD } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER GER = { has_government = ROOT } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GER" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GER" value = -6000 } }
rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_hard_ENG = { reversed = yes enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_HARD } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = ENG ENG = { has_government = ROOT } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "ENG" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "ENG" value = -6000 } }

#AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT

rule_option_ai_faction_one_ideology_soft_GER = { reversed = yes enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_ONE_IDEOLOGY_SOFT } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER } if = { limit = { has_government = anarchism } GER = { NOT = { has_government = anarchism } } } if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = communism has_government = trozkism } } GER = { NOT = { has_government = ROOT has_government = democratic has_government = neutrality } } } if = { limit = { OR = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism } } GER = { NOT = { has_government = monarchy has_government = fascism has_government = neutrality has_government = democratic } } } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "GER" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GER" value = -6000 } }

#AI_FACTION_NO

rule_option_ai_faction_no_GER = { reversed = yes enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_faction_status option = AI_FACTION_NO } NOT = { is_in_faction_with = GER } } abort_when_not_enabled = yes ai_strategy = { type = antagonize id = "D15" value = 75 } ai_strategy = { type = alliance id = "GER" value = -6000 } }

#AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_50

ai_division_limiter_50 = {
	enable = {
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_50 }
		num_divisions > 50
		is_major = no
	}
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = suppression value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = modern_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = infantry value = -6000 }
}

#AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_100

ai_division_limiter_100 = {
	enable = {
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_100 }
		num_divisions > 100
		is_major = no
	}
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = suppression value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = modern_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = infantry value = -6000 }

	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = suppression value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = modern_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = infantry value = -6000 }

#AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_DYNAMIC

ai_division_limiter_dynamic = {
	enable = {
		has_game_rule = { rule = ai_division_limiter_status option = AI_DIVISION_LIMITER_DYNAMIC }
		set_temp_variable = { ai_upper_limit = num_of_factories }
		multiply_temp_variable = { ai_upper_limit = 1.15 }
		if = {
			limit = { is_major = yes }
			multiply_temp_variable = { ai_upper_limit = 1.15 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_war = yes }
			multiply_temp_variable = { ai_upper_limit = 1.2 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { threat > 0.75 }
			multiply_temp_variable = { ai_upper_limit = 1.05 }
		}
		check_variable = { num_divisions > ai_upper_limit }
	}
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes

	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = cavalry value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = garrison value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = suppression value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = paratroopers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = mountaineers value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = marines value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = light_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = heavy_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = medium_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = modern_armor value = -6000 }
	ai_strategy = { type = build_army id = infantry value = -6000 }
}

#AI_FORCE_BUILD_ARMIES_STATUS

ai_force_build_armies_up = {
	enable = { has_game_rule = { rule = ai_force_build_armies_status option = AI_FORCE_BUILD_ARMIES_UP } has_manpower > 0 }
	abort_when_not_enabled = yes
	ai_strategy = { type = force_build_armies value = 5000 }
}
